first_translate: I was lonely.
idiom_translate: I was lonely.

idiom:

인간 방패라도 되라고 : At least be a human shield
한가지 억울한 점이 있다면 : If there's one thing that feels unfair
어딘가에 빛이 있을 거라고 : There must be light somewhere
내가 누군가의 빛이 되고 싶어 : I want to be someone's light
지긋지긋했던 내 인생 : My wretched life
